text: ...well since you don't remember anything it will be difficult for you survive...
Hmmm? How do I know you have no memories?

What a childish question! (burst a short satisfied laugh) 
I think it is understandable... after you made that CHOICE.
What? you want me to help you?
Well.. you already have that dull knife... use it..
Don't misunderstand, I'm not on anyone's side...
I just want to see you struggle (chortling)
